New Records: Paul Skenes is the only pitcher in baseball history to have a sub-2.20 ERA and 150-plus strikeouts in his first 21 games
Pre-Game Insights: Paul Skenes, the Pirates' starting pitcher, has a 10-3 record with a 2.07 ERA and 158 strikeouts in 126.0 innings this season; Hunter Greene, the Reds' starting pitcher, is returning from the injured list with a 9-4 record and a 2.83 ERA
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates are focused on building a strong future with young pitchers like Paul Skenes and Jared Jones; the Reds are aiming to bounce back after missing the playoffs since the 2020 season
Others: The game starts at 1:10 p.m. ET
